thread.title: IN PICTURES: Ayanda Ncwane makes first public appearance since Sfiso's death
thread.title_full: IN PICTURES: Ayanda Ncwane makes first public appearance since Sfiso's death

title: IN PICTURES: Ayanda Ncwane makes first public appearance since Sfiso's death
text:
South Africa is to blame for breaking Lundi, says close friend 
Ever since her husband's death, Ayanda has been in mourning away from the spotlight. 
However, in the wake of fellow gospel star Lundi Tyamara's death, Ayanda attended his memorial service at Grace Bible Church to pay her respects. 
Lundi played a vital role in Sfiso's career by helping him break into the industry - a gesture that has not been forgotten by his family. 
Dressed in all-black Ayanda struggled to fight back tears throughout the service. Ayanda Ncwane leaves the memorial service of #lundityamara #lundityamaraMemorial pic.twitter.com/LKOtXlUmDJ
